title: Podcast Listener Q&A
itunes:title: Podcast Listener Q&A
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

Today we take some questions from our Losing 100 Pounds With Phit-N-Phat podcast Facebook page!

We hit all kinds of topics including most common member questions, wrapping your brain around a weight gain, the fatigue caused by doing the emotional work, and how to find some cost saving hacks that facilitate weight loss.

If you'd like to join our Podcast Facebook Group, go to the link below and sign up for my free course! You'll get a link to the group and all the benefits of discussing the podcast with other listeners just like you!
